thread.title: 10 U.S. Colleges With the Best Dining Halls
thread.title_full: 10 U.S. Colleges With the Best Dining Halls

title: 10 U.S. Colleges With the Best Dining Halls
text:
10 U.S. Colleges With the Best Dining Halls Written by: Caroline Nolan 09/25/15 - 3:25 PM EDT 
NEW YORK (MainStreet) -- When I started college, I never thought much about my on-campus meals. The food served at our dining halls wasn't exactly gourmet, but it was better than I had expected campus food to taste. 
It wasn't until I visited friends at other schools that I began to realize how important good-quality dining halls are to the college experience. Those at schools with great on-campus options were generally happier and healthier, while those who considered their campus meals unappetizing were the opposite (possibly due to too much delivery pizza). 
Some schools go above and beyond what is expected of a campus meal plan. Using data collected from student surveys and average meal plan costs, ranking and review site Niche.com has compiled a list of the colleges with the best campus food in the United States. More Headlines
